Study Reconciliation Service. org.dcm4chex.archive.mbean.StudyReconciliationService The default constructor StudyReconciliationService Interval in which to check for studies for Reconciliation.
Format:
interval!from-to or NEVER
interval = ##s (in seconds), ##m (in minutes), ##h (in hours).
from = start hour (0-23) when no Study Reconciliation should be performed
to = end hour (0-23) when no Study Reconciliation should be performed
NEVER = disable automatic Study Reconciliation
Example:10s!9-17 means every 10 seconds, poll the database and check study that need Reconciliation, except between the hours of 9:00am and 5:00pm. By setting this type of TaskInterval, you can ensure checks occur outside of peak imaging hours. TaskInterval java.lang.String AE Title of reference FIND SCP.
